item.description: It’s possible to share a secret amongst a group of people so that only some of them are needed to reconstruct it…

item.title: Dead Person Switches - secrets from beyond the grave
item.description: More commonly known as a Dead Man’s Switch, a Dead Person Switch (DPS) is a system that can hold a secret on behalf of a person, and govern its release should they become unavailable.
